document_data.name: Midler{{DDO-Midler}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Midler''' family was a farming household that lived near the village of [[Eveningstar]] in [[Cormyr]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], led by the family patriarch [[Ricnan Midler]]. They were joined there by the '''Chandler''' family, who had married into the Midlers.
